EmailTemplate.name: 4_17_2015 ATG Freight Send 2.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Next Week! Deploying and Automating a Mission-Critical VDI Environment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/resources/webinar-deploying-automating-mission-critical-virtual-desktops-at-atg-freight-llc?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=atg-webinar&utm_content=04172015> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Join us next week on April 24th at 1:30 PM EST <http://vmturbo.com/resources/webinar-deploying-automating-mission-critical-virtual-desktops-at-atg-freight-llc?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=atg-webinar&utm_content=04172015> as we find out how American Transport Group deployed and automated their VDI-based mobile workforce!
We will learn:
- How ATG handled an annual workload growth rate of 30% with a combination of EMC Clariion disk and Pure Storage flash arrays. - Why guaranteeing reliable service was so challenging in such an environment. - How they dealt with performance troubleshooting. - What they ultimately did to move from pinpointing and troubleshooting to a more automated approach.
<http://vmturbo.com/resources/webinar-deploying-automating-mission-critical-virtual-desktops-at-atg-freight-llc?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=atg-webinar&utm_content=04172015>
-The VMTurbo Team
